term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spot in chromatography
term.title: spot

item.text: A zone in paper and thin-layer chromatography of approximately circular appearance.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 834 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
